content.question: <math alttext="the limit as x approaches 0, of, the fraction with numerator the sine of x, and denominator e to the x power, minus 1, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> is

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction 1 over e" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
